Package dev.schoolmanagement.service.concrete

Class ExceptionLogServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
dev.schoolmanagement.service.concrete.ExceptionLogServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BaseService<ExceptionLogDTO>, ExceptionLogService, LogService
@Service @Transactional(readOnly=true) public class ExceptionLogServiceImpl extends Object implements ExceptionLogService
ExceptionLogService implementation class. All of its methods are declared readOnly at class level, writing methods are excluded by @Transactional annotation.
Author:
Erhan Cavdar.
